title: 服务器输入/spawn出现显示你的内部错误发生而试图执行次指令
author: mo-sheng

replies.author: mo-sheng
replies.txt_content:
标题: 服务器输入/spawn出现显示你的内部错误发生而试图执行次指令我创建地皮世界，前往地皮世界后，输入回城指令和/setspawn就出现[img=0,1]file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\1760513613\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\3{[V8VQAFP1K7}@PM0KMVS0.png[/img]An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command
别的指令都可以
输入求解。

[img]file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\1760513613\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\3{[V8VQAFP1K7}@PM0KMVS0.png[/img]

replies.author: mo-sheng
replies.txt_content:
yellow_Gay 发表于 2016-10-6 15:47
输入/mv setspawn
还是不行。

replies.author: yellow_Gay
replies.txt_content:
在服务器内输入/mv delete plotworld
然后重新创建一个地皮世界

replies.author: zxczly
replies.txt_content:
essentials删掉配置重新载入
如不行，换个essentials插件

replies.author: wszxl
replies.txt_content: 你先/setspawn啊，你没设置spawn的固定地点咋spawn
